sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
for someone
, je namenjeno temu, da bi tisto nekdo imel ali imel korist od tistega.

seg.quote: He left a note for her on the table.
I am doing everything I can for you.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo, kadar opisujemo namen nečesa oziroma razlog ali povod za nekaj.

seg.quote: ...a knife for cutting linoleum.
This area is famous for its spring flowers.

sense.def:
To work for someone
pomeni, da nas nekdo zaposluje.

seg.quote: He works for British Rail.

sense.def:
To speak or act for someone
pomeni, da govorimo ali delamo v imenu nekoga.

seg.quote: We are speaking for the majority of the British people.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo, kadar želimo povedati, da nekaj vpliva na nekoga.

seg.quote: I knew it was difficult for him to talk like this.
It was a frightening experience for a boy.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo tudi tedaj, ko omenimo osebo ali stvar, do katere nekaj čutimo.

seg.quote: I felt sorry for my wife.
...Kurt's contempt for people.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo, kadar omenimo dve enakovredni stvari ali taki, ki ju je mogoče zamenjati.

seg.quote: ‘Carte’ is the French word for card.
...a substitute for natural rubber.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo tudi tedaj, ko rečemo, da je nečesa dovolj.

seg.quote: There was room for a table.
He didn't have the concentration required for doing the job.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo, kadar želimo poudariti, da nekaj traja ali se nadaljuje.

seg.quote: I have known you for a long time.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo tudi tedaj, ko povemo, kako daleč nekaj sega.

seg.quote: Black cliffs rose sheer out of the water for a hundred feet or more.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj načrtovano
for a particular time
, se bo zgodilo ob določenem času.

seg.quote: The meeting has been scheduled for August 30.

sense.def:
To leave for a place
ali
to take a train, plane, or boat for a place
pomeni, da gremo v neki kraj.

seg.quote: ...one morning, before he left for the fields.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo, kadar govorimo o ceni nečesa.

seg.quote: You can buy the paperback for about two pounds.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
uporabimo tudi tedaj, kadar navedemo drugi del v razmerju.

seg.quote: About nine women have lost their jobs for every five men.

sense.def:
To be for something
pomeni biti nečemu naklonjen.

seg.quote: There was a majority of 294 for war, with only 6 voting against.

sense.def:
Besedo
for
včasih uporabimo v pomenu
because
;

seg.quote: This was where he spent his free time, for he had nowhere else to go.

sense.def:
Izraz, kot je
for the first time
, uporabimo, kadar povemo, ob kakšni priložnosti se je nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: The guide returned for the third time.

sense.def:
To be all for something
pomeni biti zelo naklonjen nečemu.
